column3: “I think some of this right before I wanted to fall asleep. It did relax me which was nice. About 10 minutes later I got really hungry and went downstairs and made some beer cheese popcorn and ate a whole bowl full. Then I waited like an hour and vaped some more and I was starving so I went down and ate 400 calories worth of hummus, a bunch of cheddar cheese, some prosciutto, an apple, and then I decided to eat bunch ...”
“Relaxing and not a complete knockout, at first. Eventually... nice for drifting off to sleep, after a flurry of strange thoughts...”

“A double indica hybrid?! 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 This gets 5 fires! The couch lock effect kicks in immediately and again about a half hour later. A hint of chocolate rolls through your mouth as you draw in the sweet smoke with a berry after taste. This is an excellent choice for someone struggling with insomnia, nausea, anxiety, etc. in my opinion.”

“~ smoked last, about one day from this.

~ It has a taste to it, first time around an well, first its a nice mellow feeling of the body and is a nice, it has a nice over all 

~ color =  well has a darker color and it a a kind of darker green and brown/darker spots a bit spaced out every where.

~ Smell = well, it has a middle big smell when about 3.50 GR, and about six bowls is a light smell, and only one bowl in it...”

“This is a great strain if you are trying to create.   Also great if you are are trying to really listen to some new music and wrap your head around it.  It won't lay you out rather make you want to do something or create something”

“isn't it weird that a super flu hits the US right when Donald Trump takes office? Thank God for medication it almost makes me forget that I'm sick, but it still doesn't take away the pain of Donald Trump.”

“Smells like a mix of chocolate/coffee and some earthy blueberry-ish sweet aroma. rolled a 2 gram doobie, smoked half and saved half for later👌🏽 took about 5 mins for the high to kick in, but once it hits it hits hard. more of a body high, but the heady sativa effects are definitely still there. i smoke to help with my anxiety and chronic pains in my chest stomach and back. As far as the pain, this strain did wonder...”

“I was fortunate enough to get to try this strain before it was even listed on Leafly! 

VERY unique smell and flavor, and kind of a hard strain to come across. Has a sweet smell on the coffeeish/tobacco/earthy side of things. Taste is somewhat fruity with light notes of chocolate and nutty undertones. 

Heady, stoney, smiley stuff here.

And like I said, this strain can be difficult to find, so if ya see it, GRAB SOM...”
“It's a creeper. Blurs the edges. I'll be alert for awhile then night night.  Tasted like Berry could not believe it”
“you taste a hint of the chocolate and berries also smokes great”

“So far this is the best cannibas I've tried for my anxiety. It definitely mellowed me out. All need is one hit/drag" and it calms me down instantly if I feel a rush of anxious thoughts or an anxiety attack coming on.

column1: It could also probably be used to help you fall asleep.”"

column3: “This strain is not one that called out to me through appearance.  The name Chocolate Hashberry was enticing enough to get me to take a sniff from the jar.  Even that left me a little turned off with the bud giving off a light sweet grass smell.  This budtender obviously new his herb because like a true professional without a word a bud was broken open with tweezers.  Such a simple act spoke volumes in my nostrils giv...”

“Reviewed under Hashberry prior to its listing as its own strain.

Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer. 

Pros: Strong pain relief and euphoric head high. More hybrid than straight indica. Good if you need to eat, made me quite hungry. 

Cons: Dry eyes and some dry mouth. Little groggy after waking up, still felt some of the head effects.

Overall/Other: Smooth draw and exhale. Taste was sweet/earthy. I could tas...”
“Super sleepy strain with nice purple buds and caked with trichomes, makes me wanna slap a bag of hot Cheetos in my mouth and still eat dinner.”

“I recently bought a gram of this strain from a local shop (ReLeaf, Vallejo CA) for migraine pain. It was the first time a strain actively numbed my pain. Though only the mild ones, it did nothing for the higher pain headaches.

It's a wonderful little bud covered in trichomes and it's always fluffy. I was attracted to it initially by look alone. It's definitely a pretty bud.”
“one of my favorites it has lots of flavir and is very potent and relaxing. it allows you to fall asleep easy or to stay awake and it is frosty”

“This strain is not one that called out to me through appearance.  The name Chocolate Hashberry was enticing enough to get me to take a sniff from the jar.  Even that left me a little turned off with the bud giving off a light sweet grass smell.  This budtender obviously new his herb because like a true professional without a word a bud was broken open with tweezers.  Such a simple act spoke volumes in my nostrils giv...”

“This is consistently the best looking bud in the shop. Others are more dense but this one is simply covered in trichomes. Its green leaves verge on tan because of this. This provides a visually appealing contrast to the orange hairs and large amounts of purple. 

Texturally speaking I've found it to be fairly soft - easy to break up into small leaf fragments, but not so pliable that you need to rip it apart with 4 fi...”

“Well balanced. However, nothing stood out to me about this strain. It was a run of the mill high but there was not distinctions worth noting. Good for sleep. Similar to Blue Dream but not as euphoric.”

“Really heady. Has a great, mild flavor when herb vaped. Doesn't knock you out, but definitely has a cerebral effect. Great for creativity and visual imagery, but I did also feel couch locked for a time, so that made it harder to do anything with it. Did not particularly assist muscular pain for me, in fact felt more aware of muscle stiffness, but I would use it again for the mental effects.”
“Very nice for helping me relax. Very few strains actually help me sleep, and this is one of them.”

“Chocolate smell all the way.  These buds looked amazing, thanks to Level Up in Scottsdale. Purple & super frosty. Was excited to try this one, & it didn’t disappoint. The high was relaxing and euphoric, evoking some strange thoughts & perception was a little funny.. but maybe I was just tired. Medium - strong , I liked it. I usually smoke in the evenings. Last night I took a puff before bed, didn’t wake up once durin...”
“very tasty strain smooth smoke nice mellow body high will definitely get more of this”

“This looked too incredible not to try. 
I smoked some.  Sure as shit... I'm just having a good time.”

“Really heady. Has a great, mild flavor when herb vaped. Doesn't knock you out, but definitely has a cerebral effect. Great for creativity and visual imagery, but I did also feel couch locked for a time, so that made it harder to do anything with it. Did not particularly assist muscular pain for me, in fact felt more aware of muscle stiffness, but I would use it again for the mental effects.”

“Got a 1/2 if this a was pleased as punch. The Phat & Dense ßudz (flowers) were chunky & left a slight low-key
Choco-taste on my pallet. Heavy Resin producer with medium-lasting effects. Above average Medication.
💨👍🏼🍀”

“Wanna feel relaxed but get sh*t done? Well I do, and this was a great strain to do it. My pain was eased. I also felt a bit talkative. Got my housework and other things accomplished. All over great experience.😄”

“Well balanced. However, nothing stood out to me about this strain. It was a run of the mill high but there was not distinctions worth noting. Good for sleep. Similar to Blue Dream but not as euphoric.”
“very tasty strain smooth smoke nice mellow body high will definitely get more of this”

“This choco hashberry is amazing in every way. It tastes amazing, it smells amazing and the high is AMAZING!  New favorite for sure. Took away my joint pain and rash from celiac disease. I'm feeling mighty fine with this choco hashberry. Yummmmmy”

“This looked too incredible not to try. 
I smoked some.  Sure as shit... I'm just having a good time.”

“This is some heavy stuff. Definitely came on quick and then kept coming. Personally didn't like the high. Found my mind racing and became very fidgety. I smoke mainly for anxiety and this didn't seem to help. I'm sure it's great for a lot of other people, but personally it just got me a little too wired up. Smells and tastes great though!”

“Wanna feel relaxed but get sh*t done? Well I do, and this was a great strain to do it. My pain was eased. I also felt a bit talkative. Got my housework and other things accomplished. All over great experience.😄”

“Smoking right now and the first pull definitely had me coughing a lung out but maybe bc I took a long break from weed but I like the taste of it definitely is good to listen to music too and to relief stress.”
“Omg this is the best! I just can’t even with how uplifted I am feeling. This. Is. Amazing! Instantly euphoric. ❤️”
“Good high, good taste, good bud. Enough said.”

“Been smoking on this the past couple days and it gets you super high, but for me if i smoked too much of it i got deep into my head and also felt like it made me dream weird things, which would bring out my anxiety. Also dont gas a blunt to the face with this stuff, youll always end up passing out. Other then that it smells great ( just like chocolate lol ) and its very potent. great to smoke at lake, with people, fo...”
“Tastes amazing, very dense and beautiful. One of my favorites.”

“This is a nice chocolates berry leaning indices that doesn’t quite lock you to the couch! 
It’s bomb, mellow smooth dessert style flavor. 
The grower was Attis, and I would def recommend this strain as a afternoon indica!”

“Taste great!! I taste the deep chocolate purple 
I feel focused but like a G, like I got today handled.”
“It works great for pain!”
“Very uplifting! Definitely an active high ✌🏼️”
“Love love love this strain, burns really well and the taste is absolutely incredible HIGHLY RECOMMENDED”
“It is just 👌🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥”
“Hashberry is one of my favorites by chocolate hashberry takes it to a new level of love form me!”

“Not sure if this one is for me. I smoked a gram of this in a blunt and it made me feel so happy and uplifted, everything was great. However as the high went on I became a bit easily annoyed and frustrated at simple things. Other than that it was a brilliant high, I liked it but again it didnt suit me 100%. I would imagine in smaller doses and perhaps on a couch with friends in the evening time after work would be the...”

“Excellent cut of flower acquired at Hotbox farms in Huntington Oregon. Flower grown from Jim Belushi farm in Oregon. Very berry w/ spice undertones on the nose. The smoke was very smooth burned white ash. Terpene profile i acquired was berry/spice on inhale exhale was woody slight nutty.. The high came on quick and focused in head the to a body relaxation. Which allowed you to focus on a task on hand.”
“Smooth, soft, yet strong high. Warps time and sound. Everything seems bright and smooth. I had a dance party with my cat off this high.”

“This is my favorite smoke of alllllllll time! this chocolate hashberry always comes out perfect! Not only does it look amazing but the tastes and the high is amazing. It has a very mellow and euphoric High. I was still able to go about my day after smoking a bowl but a couple bowls and youll be on the couch.”

“This is a nice chocolates berry leaning indices that doesn’t quite lock you to the couch! 
It’s bomb, mellow smooth dessert style flavor. 
The grower was Attis, and I would def recommend this strain as a afternoon indica!”
“Top tier smoke. Thick and earthy - sweet smoke that hangs in the air and twists through whatever light it finds.”

“Tried this one first time today purely because of how good the concentrate looked. I am beyond pleased. Great body high and doesnt bring me down in terms of mood. My mood feels uplifted and positive (i wouldnt go as far as saying it makes me feel happy, more content with the present accompanied by more positive thoughts flowing). Definitely feel a little head high going  but not too strong. I actually had a throbbing...”
“the only problem is the dry mouth after you finished smoking...but it's a good strain.”
“Tastes amazing, very dense and beautiful. One of my favorites.”
“Good high, good taste, good bud. Enough said.”

“HOLY MOLY!!!!  I'm in love with chocolate hashberry". This strain creeps up on you and then it starts from the top of your head and creeps all the way to your toes.  it is great for pain.  what i like is if i want to just "chill"
column4: it's great or if i want to be motivated

column3: “I tried the Him Belushi strain that gag a great tangy sweet intro with a subtle chocolate finish and of course that euphoric feeling”
“Great to chill and enjoy a movie or look at some art. Not great if you’re trying to be talkative. Just relaxxxxxx”
“decent smooth calm buzz”
“House of cultivar has good oil and flower of chocolate hash berry. Two worlds collide of fruity and stinky weed. Relaxed and euphoric. I highly recommend for anytime and anything.”
“The entirety of the experience with this strain is smooth from start to finish. Stinky, with a flavorful taste. i would love to see more of this strain ☺”
“don't recall tasting chocolate, but it did have an earthy taste”

“Incredible smoking flavor. I usually make my flower into concentrate or vaporize it, but this is best smoked for the good chocolately flavor. 

Not tired, not wired, just a good all purpose high. Go to bed if you want, do something if you want. 

Most dense strain I have ever grown. Four ounces to a half gallon jar.”

“Been smoking on this the past couple days and it gets you super high, but for me if i smoked too much of it i got deep into my head and also felt like it made me dream weird things, which would bring out my anxiety. Also dont gas a blunt to the face with this stuff, youll always end up passing out. Other then that it smells great ( just like chocolate lol ) and its very potent. great to smoke at lake, with people, fo...”
“Omg this is the best! I just can’t even with how uplifted I am feeling. This. Is. Amazing! Instantly euphoric. ❤️”

“Smoking right now and the first pull definitely had me coughing a lung out but maybe bc I took a long break from weed but I like the taste of it definitely is good to listen to music too and to relief stress.”
“Chocolate Hashberry works very well for my pain. At 25% THC it's pretty strong. Has a good taste easy to smoke.”

“as I read the reviews, as I love to do with strains (newb) while smoking this strain. I'm just so happy, and some of these posts are in-depth and hilarious. So I'm already feeling the affects and they are awesome. A burstable Indica, fantastic smell and overall I'm loving this feeling.”
“The high is a very happy get stuff done high. Very energetic and creative....3 hours into it getting a little sleepy”

“First time I smoked this strain, out of a potato damnit, although I wasn’t blasted, It was great to help boost my energy, very happy and was super motivated, didn’t feel anxious or anything. Easily one of my favorites already!”
“I just smoked a bowl of this and honestly it’s the least harshest weed I’ve ever smoked, it’s wonderful tastes more like vanilla to me, it does make you super sleepy that’s for sure!”

“This Chocolate Hashberry is pretty fuckin strong. It's hits hard while you're smoking and it taste really good. Almost like a dark chocolate taste but kinda spicy. After I was done with the joint, I felt real functional and talkative, but as time went on.....the creeper. Couch locked outta my ass! As I write this I'm melting into my couch watching the IT remake..talk about floating!!?! But yeah, the nod off is crazy....”
“Nice burn, instant cerebral high.”

“Mild enjoyable strain that is relaxing but lacks the punch of the best strains out there. Being a premium priced strain, means it needs to be better than the value stuff. Not so with this strain. It's not bad, but really when is it ever bad. Don't buy this strain.”
“Smells so sweet, tastes great. Really helps my anxiety!”
“this is a great strain, and made me feel uplifted. and chill after a long day.”
“Smooth af nice indica itll do the job”

“oh it smells great for flower. not weedy. 
pipe first hit will make you cough
Second way better- first time I've actually smoked a Flavor " and actually tasted berry and smelled chocolate before lighting

“One of the best Indica's  leaning Hybrids ever! Great energy but calmness and productivity or just chilling to movies/music.Smells like chocolate with a purple berry coloring among dark chocolate leaves. Best any time of day really!!”
“This isnt Chocolate Hashberry. How people have been so niave to not realize this intill now is mind blowing. Also convenient that my comments noting such have not been posted by Leafly.”
